  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vsiljeno dušeno nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">Forced dumped oscillations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorverlegte ausgegebene Pendelbewegungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oscillations vidées obligatoires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oscilações despejadas forçadas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oscillazioni fatte uscire forzate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναγκασμένες καταγραμμένες ταλαντώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oscilaciones vaciadas forzadas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Primer hkratnega vsiljenega in dušenega nihanja mase na vodoravni vzmeti ob prisotnosti trenja in zunanje sile, ter ravnovesju med njima.</string>
            <string language="en">Example of damped and forced oscillation of mass on horizontal spring with the presence of friction and external force and balance between them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">harmonično nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">harmonic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vsiljeno nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">forced oscillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dušeno nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">damped motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">resonanca</string>
            <string language="en">resonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beispiel der Dämpfung und erzwungenen 
Pendelbewegung der Masse auf horizontalem Frühling mit dem 
Vorhandensein der Friktion und der externen Kraft und der Balance 
zwischen sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exemple de l'oscillation atténuée et forcée de
la masse le ressort horizontal avec la présence du frottement et la 
force et l'équilibre externes entre elles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exemplo da oscilação umedecida e forçada da 
massa na mola horizontal com a presença da fricção e força e 
contrapeso externos entre elas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esempio di oscillazione smorzata e forzata di 
massa sulla molla orizzontale con la presenza di attrito e forza ed 
equilibrio esterni fra loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράδειγμα της μετριασμένης και αναγκασμένης 
ταλάντωσης της μάζας στο οριζόντιο ελατήριο με την παρουσία 
τριβής και εξωτερικής δύναμης και την ισορροπία μεταξύ τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejemplo de la oscilación humedecida y forzada de
la masa en el resorte horizontal con la presencia de la fricción y 
fuerza y equilibrio externos entre ellas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">harmonische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vorverlegte Pendelbewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dämpfung Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Resonanz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement harmonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oscillation obligatoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement atténué</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">résonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento harmonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oscilação forçada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento umedecido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">resonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento armonico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oscillazione forzata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento smorzato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">risonanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρμονική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναγκασμένη ταλάντωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετριασμένη κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντήχηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">oscilación forzada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento humedecido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resonancia</string>
          </keyword>
